comment:
Correct verification of the vertex x=y=z, no details about the rest of the cases (model uses inequalites that are not shown). Moreover, there are errors, e.g. in step 2, for (x,y,z)=(1,1,4) one must prove
(2k)! + (n+m)! >= (n+k)! + (m+k)!.
However, the proposed inequality
(2k)! + (2\cdot\frac{n+m}{2})! >= 2(k+\frac{n+m}{2})!
bears no relation to (n+k)! or (m+k)!).
